headline: WATCH: Rising GOP Star Kari Lake Tells Tyrants To “SHOVE IT” During CPAC Speech, Crowd Reacts: “USA, USA, USA”
author: Jordan Conradson
sentences:
Kari Lake, the Trump-endorsed candidate for Arizona Governor, spoke last night at CPAC in Orlando, FL, where she told the tyrants in America to “shove it.”
“We’re in the eleventh hour, and our time is running out,” said Lake referring to the state of the Union today.

TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO)
Crowd: USA, USA, USA
The crowd broke out in a “USA” chant.
Lake honored America’s Founding Fathers for their courage in the eleventh hour when they signed the Declaration of Independence and declared war on the world’s largest military force.
And I’ll tell you what, if those patriots way back when gave those tyrants the middle finger, then there is no reason that we cannot tell our tyrants today to shove it, right?
They lost more than a paycheck and a pension when 56 men signed their death warrant when they signed the Declaration of Independence.
We need to replace the RINOs with real fighters who will serve the American people.
Our forefathers lost a whole lot more than a client.
Lake: I want to tell you this.
